subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The command example demonstrates the integration of SchemaCrawler with Apache Jakarta Velocity.

ol.li:
Install
ant,
and make sure that ant is on your path.
Copy the schemacrawler.config.properties file into the velocity example directory.

Download
Velocity,
and copy all of the jar files required by Velocity (at least commons collections and log4j) into the velocity example directory.
Start the database server by running StartDatabaseServer script from the distribution directory.
Start a command shell in the velocity example directory.
Try modifying the Velocity template, tables.vm to modify the output produced.
